service.name: SkinPen Microneedling

seo.title: SkinPen® Microneedling in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Refine texture and tone with SkinPen® microneedling. Minimal downtime; option to boost with PRP (VAMP).

overview.p1: SkinPen creates micro-channels that stimulate collagen for smoother, more even-toned skin.
overview.p2: We set depths by area and can add PRP for glow—typically in a 3–4 session plan.

whyReluxe.title: Depth control
whyReluxe.body: Face-mapping ensures the right depth for each zone.

whyReluxe.title: PRP option
whyReluxe.body: Add your own growth factors for an extra boost.

whyReluxe.title: Minimal downtime
whyReluxe.body: Clear expectations for pinkness and care.

service.tagline: Refine texture and tone. Option to add PRP (VAMP).

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: Pair with PRP for enhanced glow and recovery.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
